events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website but it doesn't fit me at all and I would like to request a refund for the item.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to product size mismatch and customer wanting money back.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund request case for the customer.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I see you want to request a refund for your jacket. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in original packaging for processing the refund?
Thank you for your prompt reply. My order number is 7845123. The jacket is still unused and I have kept it in the original packaging.
Great! I have initiated your refund process. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thanks, Sarah! I appreciate the quick help and look forward to receiving the return shipping label in my email.
The refund has been successfully scheduled once the returned item is received and inspected. We will notify you when the refund is complete.
Just checking in to confirm if you have sent the jacket back and whether you need any further assistance from us.
Yes, I dropped the package off at the post office yesterday. Thank you for following up!
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund today. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Your refund case is now closed. Please contact us anytime if you have more questions or need further assistance.
We have sent a short survey to your email to gather feedback on your customer support experience today.
